title: Doctor Who
plot_summary: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
plot_summary: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

title: The Bear
plot_summary: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.

title: Supernatural
plot_summary: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.
